mapper.select: {CALL sp_det_quema_producto_ins( #{idDetalleQuemaProducto, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{idQuemaProducto, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{lado, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{tFechaDetalle, jdbcType = DATE, mode = IN}, #{tipo, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{activo, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{usuarioCreacion, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{resultado, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = OUT} ) }
